column2: The  crux  of the  instant  Appeal,  as  submitted  by  the  learned  Counsel  for  the
Appellant,  is  whether  the  learned  Trial  Judge  had  erred  in  fact  and  in  law  by

column1: established  under  Section  296  of the  Penal  Code  beyond  reasonable  doubt  in

column2: light of the several grounds of Appeal as submitted by him.
